text: The men's +109 kg competition of the weightlifting events at the 2019 Pan American Games in Lima, Peru, was held on July 30 at the Coliseo Mariscal Caceres. ==Results== 5 athletes from five countries took part. {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center;" ! title: Weightlifting at the 2019 Pan American Games – Men's +109 kg
